scripts.xbuildall: npx wp-scripts build $(for d in $(ls ./blocks/);do echo './blocks/'$d ; done) --output-path=./build/code
scripts.xstartall: npx wp-scripts start $(for d in $(ls ./blocks);do echo './blocks/'$d ; done) --output-path=./build/code
scripts.startall: npm run copyFolderStructure && npm run copyBlockJson && npm run xstartall
scripts.buildall: npm run copyFolderStructure && npm run copyBlockJson && npm run xbuildall
